dcterms:creator: F. Liu
Y.-F. Liu
A. Li
C. Masouros
Y. C. Eldar
dcterms:description: This dataset is used for optimizing the Cramér-Rao bound in the context of joint radar-communication beamforming.
dcterms:title: Cramér-Rao Bound (CRB) Optimization

dcterms:creator: L. Chen
F. Liu
W. Wang
C. Masouros
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on joint radar-communication transmission using a generalized Pareto optimization framework.
dcterms:title: Joint Radar-Communication Transmission

dcterms:creator: W. Yuan
F. Liu
C. Masouros
J. Yuan
D. W. K. Ng
N. González-Prelcic
dcterms:description: This dataset is utilized for Bayesian predictive beamforming in vehicular networks, emphasizing a low-overhead joint radar-communication approach.
dcterms:title: Bayesian Predictive Beamforming

dcterms:creator: C. Liu
W. Yuan
S. Li
dcterms:description: This dataset is focused on learning-based predictive beamforming for integrated sensing and communication in vehicular networks.
dcterms:title: Learning-Based Predictive Beamforming

dcterms:creator: Z. Du
F. Liu
W. Yuan
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses integrated sensing and communications for vehicle-to-infrastructure networks, focusing on dynamic predictive beamforming for extended vehicle targets.
dcterms:title: Integrated Sensing and Communications for V2I Networks

dcterms:creator: F. Gao
L. Xu
S. Ma
dcterms:description: This dataset explores integrated sensing and communications with joint beam-squint and beam-split techniques for mmWave/THz massive MIMO systems.
dcterms:title: Integrated Sensing and Communications with Joint Beam-Squint

dcterms:creator: X. Chen
Z. Feng
Z. Wei
dcterms:description: This dataset is related to a multiple signal classification based joint communication and sensing system.
dcterms:title: Multiple Signal Classification Based Joint Communication and Sensing System

dcterms:creator: N. Su
Z. Wei
C. Masouros
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on a secure dual-functional radar-communication system that exploits known interference in the presence of clutter.
dcterms:title: Secure Dual-Functional Radar-Communication System

dcterms:creator: C. Liao
F. Wang
V. K. N. Lau
dcterms:description: This dataset provides an optimized design for IRS-assisted integrated sensing and communication systems in clutter environments.
dcterms:title: IRS-Assisted Integrated Sensing and Communication Systems
